Name: 18层
About the game: Fear often comes from itself, and we just wake it up. 18th Floor is a psychological horror independent game, the background of which is set in the Republic of China. You are in hell, and you need to leave every level of hell. You can decipher the story behind it and slowly experience the horror at every level. Unlike other chasing horror, this book uses unknown horror and atmosphere to render horror. This book focuses on psychic terror, decryption, and fragmented narration . Mechanism This work adopts PT's reincarnation system, and the horror of each layer is different. It seems the same layout, different horror experience, always tense your nerves, and the fear brought by the unknown. Plot Understand the story behind it through fragmented information, and at the same time, popularize the knowledge of Chinese ghosts and gods. I believe that both atheists and atheists can get a good experience. '18th Floor' comes from 18th floor of Chinese mythical hell , which was originally used to punish ghosts in the underworld. In the background, it happened in the hotel of the People's Republic of China. It will gradually make you understand the system of 18th floor hell and bring you terror. Words from game developers: I hope to hear your opinions and suggestions. Your support is the biggest motivation for the game to get better and better, and the game will be spread later.
